text: [Music]
DXE is an end-to-end IT services company
with over 6,000 private and public
sector clients in 70 countries the
exceed offers a wide range of services
which includes global Service Desk
support where we support over 8 million
users today in 56 languages and in over
50 different locations across the world
the XE is the first in its field in Asia
are moving into digital call center
solutions which gives us a competitive
differentiator to meet our objectives of
modernizing our offerings while bringing
in cost and process efficiencies we
zeroed in on Amazon connect from AWS a
digital service desk offering powered by
Amazon connect will bring in our various
value-added functionalities and benefits
as part of that CDI toolset through
intelligent voice response we can
provide more information to customers
and route their Falls more efficiently
and quickly at present DXE Asia is
migrating a total of thousand plus
service desk seats in Kuala Lumpur and
Manila to Amazon Connect one of the
biggest advantages from leveraging the
Amazon Connect platform is agility with
Amazon connect and Amazon Pali we can
make changes to call flows and greetings
in less than a month the time it takes
to onboard a new customer will
significantly reduce from more than
three months to a matter of few weeks
furthermore by using AWS we estimate an
efficiency improvement of thirty to
forty percent due to increased
automation and improve productivity on
existing operations in the contact
center world quality user experience is
key by using Amazon connect on the AWS
cloud DXE can harness the power of
technology and redefine the call center
experience to present to our clients a
compelling value proposition
you
